p: Currently, at least eight genera from three different families of cycads are threatened by CAS ( Garc√≠a et al., 2017), and there is an urgent need to control and manage this pest due to its rapid spread and wide host range. If this pest is not managed or controlled, it poses a threat to the ornamental cycad nursery industry and may accelerate the extinction of wild cycads ( Emshousen, Mannion & Glenn, 2004).
